======English [http://code.google.com/p/spellbook-dictionary/ http://www.secretskypeemoticons.com/skype/emoticons/flags/gb.png] Bulgarian [http://code.google.com/p/spellbook-dictionary/wiki/Honepage_bg http://www.secretskypeemoticons.com/skype/emoticons/flags/bg.png]======

Spellbook is an open source dictionary written in Java. In order to run the application you need installed [http://www.java.com/en/download/manual.jsp JRE]. Spellbook dictionary can be downloaded from [http://code.google.com/p/spellbook-dictionary/downloads/list here].


 http://i49.tinypic.com/6dv9mp.jpg


 * Supported Dictionaries
    # English - Bulgarian containing more then 45000 words.
    # Bulgarian - English containing more then 43000 words.

<br />
----

==Features==


===_Exam Module :_===


  http://i48.tinypic.com/2qsvz7q.jpg


  * English-Bulgarian and Bulgarian-English exam.
  * Three levels of difficulty and custom number of words to be used.
  * Countdown timer for the answer.
  * Wrong words checker.


===_Spell Checker :_===


  http://i45.tinypic.com/14xkx04.jpg


  * English and Bulgarian spell check.
  * Correct word suggestion.


===_Clipboard integration :_===


  http://i50.tinypic.com/elejx1.jpg


Allows you to view meaning of a copied to clipboard word. If you enable that function, small balloon will pop-up from system tray every time you copy something.


===_Look&Feel and Languages :_===


  http://i46.tinypic.com/2nukj6p.jpg


  * In preferences menu you can choose between few look&feels.
  * Language: English, Bulgarian.
